alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 31 at 3:56AM CDT until August 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM UNTIL 8 PM FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS AND MUCH OF SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND VERY DRY FUELS FOR ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS AND MUCH OF SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Tyler, Hardin, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper, Southern Newton, Upper Jefferson, Northern Orange, Lower Jefferson and Southern Orange. * TIMING...10 AM until 8 PM Thursday. * WINDS...North to northeast winds 5 to 10 mph, with gusts up to 20 mph possible at times. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...95 to 100. * LIGHTNING...None. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Burn bans are in effect across Louisiana and Southeast Texas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson
